name: 安德鲁·杰克逊
bio: 美国第7任总统，民主党创始人。出身贫寒，以军功著称。推行杰克逊民主扩大白人男性选举权，但强行驱逐印第安人，是争议极大的历史人物。
bio_en: Seventh President of the United States and hero of the Battle of New Orleans. A frontier populist who expanded democratic participation for white men while pursuing brutal policies against Native Americans, including the Trail of Tears. His presidency redefined executive power and launched the era of Jacksonian Democracy.

personalEvents.title: 新奥尔良大捷
personalEvents.description: 在1812年战争中击败英军，成为国家英雄
personalEvents.description_en: Defeated the British in the War of 1812, becoming a national hero

personalEvents.title: 就任总统
personalEvents.description: 首位平民出身的总统，开启杰克逊时代
personalEvents.description_en: First President from common origins, launching the Jacksonian era

personalEvents.title: 签署印第安迁移法
personalEvents.description: 强制东部印第安人西迁，导致血泪之路
personalEvents.description_en: Forced relocation of Eastern Indians westward, leading to the Trail of Tears
